mapper.sql: SELECT PGM.BAT_PGM_ID , PGM.PGM_NM , PGM.EXEC_OBJ , PGM.PKG_NM , PGM.CLS_STP_CL , PGM.CLS_TSK_CL , PGM.PGM_CT , PGM.REGR_ID , PGM.REG_DATE , PGM.CHGR_ID , PGM.CHG_DATE , STP_CL.CODE_NM AS CLS_STP_NM , TSK_CL.CODE_NM AS CLS_TSK_NM

FROM TBLIV_BAT_PGM PGM LEFT OUTER JOIN TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL_NAME STP_CL ON STP_CL.COMMON_GRP = 'BL00018' AND STP_CL.LNG_TYP = #{lang} AND PGM.CLS_STP_CL = STP_CL.COMMON_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL_NAME TSK_CL ON TSK_CL.COMMON_GRP = 'BL00039' AND TSK_CL.LNG_TYP = #{lang} AND PGM.CLS_TSK_CL = TSK_CL.COMMON_CD
mapper.update:
UPDATE TBLIV_BAT_PGM
PGM_NM = #{pgmNm},
EXEC_OBJ = #{execObj},
PKG_NM = #{pkgNm},
CLS_STP_CL = #{clsStpCl},
CLS_TSK_CL = #{clsTskCl},
PGM_CT = #{pgmCt},
CHGR_ID = #{chgrId}, CHG_DATE = #{chgDate},
AND BAT_PGM_ID = #{batPgmId}
